name: The Tower Of TigerQiuQiu
description:
The Tower of TigerQiuQiu is a maze-based action role-playing arcade game
Player need break throught Tower
resuce princesses and escape TigerQiuQiu
as you get your way to the top of the TigerQiuQius Tower

Features:
Five Princess to choose at start
In second lap
you can choose the game boss
Dynamic mini boss of every mission
Fight vs yourself after your last Death.
